name: WP Post Signature
author: allnull

sections.description: This plugin allows you to append a signature after every post. Some variables can be used, such as %post_title%, %post_link%, %bloginfo_name%, %bloginfo_url%, and so on. It supports multiuser.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Open the plugin configuration page, which is located under “Settings -> WP Post Signature” and customize settings.
sections.faq:
What is it?

This plugin allows you to append a signature after every post.
